attributes.action: We The People demand a written Constitution
attributes.additional_details:
We demand a written constitution to fulfil the will of the people, to protect us from oppressive governments & unelected heads of state!
We demand this constitution is not written by any political party, any organs of state or any religious leaders or their organisations. We demand this constitution should be written by Law Professors from Universities, teachers who we would trust to have our best interests at heart!
attributes.background: We demand a written constitution to fulfil the will of the people

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you'd like a written constitution, but we're not sure what you'd like it to contain. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
